#Text=Official death toll from Nigerian refugee camp airstrike passes 100
#Text=Thursday , January 26 , 2017

#Text=On Monday Nigerian authorities raised the official death toll from January 17 's airstrike upon a refugee camp to 236 , though the BBC on Tuesday reported an official told them this was an error and the actual figure was 115 .
#Text=The military said at the time a jet mistook refugees for rebels .
#Text=There are no words to describe the chaos [ ... ]
#Text=I saw the bodies of children that had been cut in two .
#Text=— Aid worker Alfred Davies
#Text=The new toll updates previous estimates , which at the time of the incident were of at least 50 dead .
#Text=The BBC on Tuesday reported an official told them the figure of 236 was erroneously reached by combining the numbers of dead and wounded .
#Text=The camp in Rann , Borno State is home to thousands and lies near the northeastern border with Cameroon .
#Text=Home to those displaced by Boko Haram insurgents , the camp is in an area suffering famine .
#Text=Farmers are unable to work owing to bombs on their land .
#Text=The Red Cross was there to distribute food when the attack happened .
#Text=Twenty Nigerian Red Cross workers were injured or killed .
#Text=Médecins Sans Frontières are treating the majority of the wounded in makeshift tents in Rann , which lacks hospital facilities .
#Text=A small number have been evacuated to Maiduguri .
#Text=Military officials said at the time the Air Force had been dispatched to Rann after reports of " remnants " of Boko Haram in the area .
#Text=The military claims it is in a " final push " against the rebel group .
#Text=A promised investigation has materialised in the form of a panel of Air Force officials , with orders to complete the probe by the end of next week .
#Text=File photo of a refugee camp in Maiduguri , Nigeria .
#Text=Image : Voice of America .
#Text=Human Rights Watch have called for compensation for victims .
#Text=They say the military is not absolved of liability and suggest the camp 's tents were obvious .
#Text=Eyewitnesses say the aircraft circled twice , dropping multiple bombs , which appears corroborated by satellite imagery .
#Text=President Muhammadu Buhari called it a " regrettable operational mistake " and has since departed for a holiday in London .

column1: #Text=Journalists are barred from the military-controlled camp .
#Text=Officials claim all the dead in Rann have been buried , and two more died in hospital in Maiduguri .
#Text=Most of those killed were women and children .
#Text=Soldiers were also amongst those killed .
#Text=Eyewitnesses claim two days after the disaster in excess of 100 Boko Haram militants attacked the camp , fighting with soldiers for hours .
#Text=MSF field co-ordinator Alfred Davies said , " There are no words to describe the chaos[ ... ]

#Text= We saw dozens of patients with multiple traumatic injuries , including open fractures and wounds to the abdomen and chest , " said MSF doctor Mohammed Musoke .

column1: #Text=He described wounded children , including a crying baby with shrapnel in its neck and " a 10-year-old boy with a large , deep flesh wound to his thigh .
